explains: v. 分层而成；用压条法培植（layer 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: soil layer 土层；土壤层次
oil layer 油层；含油地层；含油层；油膜
thin layer chromatography 薄层色谱；薄层色谱法；薄层层析法
network layer [计]网路层，网路阶层

sentences.en: Niam is still learning to master the technique of mixing and layering colours.
sentences.cn: 尼亚姆现在仍在学习颜色分层和叠加技能。

sentences.en: Generally, the layering occurs on an annual basis, hence the observed changes in the records can be dated.
sentences.cn: 一般来说，分层是按年进行的，因此我们可以确定记录中观察到的变化的日期。

sentences.en: This could also work by layering a capelet style over tailoring.
sentences.cn: 这也可以通过在剪裁上分层设计小披肩样式来实现。
